name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
May 20, Shenzhen, Guangdong. The site of Futian Free Trade Zone Foreign Language Primary School was expropriated and it will stop operating before July 20, leaving the students of the school without a school to attend.
On that day, parents gathered at the Futian District Education Bureau to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Douban entry for Lou Ye's "An Unfinished Film" removed

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Lou Ye talks about film censorship in an interview in 2018

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On May 20, I accompanied Teacher Liu Xia to mourn Mr. Liu Xiaobo in the Garden of the Righteous in Milan.
May his spirit always inspire us to pursue justice and freedom.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
May 20, Tangshan, Hebei. Tangshan Second Hospital owed medical staff wages, and employees came to the local petition office to petition for wages.
According to medical staff who participated in the rights protection on site, the hospital did not allow employees to go to work from February 1 this year, and there was no written notice. Not only were their wages and insurance suspended, but the hospital leaders could not be found. During the epidemic, they were on the front line, doing the hardest and most tiring work, and now that the epidemic is over, they kicked us out.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 20, Chenzhou, Hunan. It was reported online that a knife attack occurred in Suxian District, but almost no footage of the scene was released. On the 21st, the police issued a notice that the suspect had been arrested. The case caused 3 deaths and 2 injuries.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 20, the prosecutor of the International Criminal Court applied for arrest warrants for the Israeli Prime Minister and Hamas leaders. However, Xinhua News Agency only reported the arrest warrant for the Israeli Prime Minister and did not mention the Hamas leaders.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 21, in Longnu Town, Guang'an, Sichuan, a white car suddenly hit pedestrians on the roadside, killing five people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 20, in Shaoyang, Hunan, a poster of a naked man and woman appeared in front of the Huochangping Town Government. The text below accused a government employee of suspected adultery.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 21, a knife attack occurred on bus No. 37 in Zigong City, Sichuan Province.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 21, Luzhou, Sichuan. An old man held a passing woman hostage and ordered everyone around him to retreat 100 meters. He threatened, "I will take the hostage and make him my hostage" and "I will find someone to take the blame for me. I will die early and reincarnate early." Then he was subdued by a crowd of people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On May 19, in Tangshan, Hebei, a watermelon vendor in Kaiping District sold watermelons to customers at a discount. The customer found that the watermelons were of poor quality and wanted to return them, which led to a dispute between the two parties. The vendor stabbed the man who bought the watermelons with a knife.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
At this moment, outside Taiwan’s Legislative Yuan, people peacefully rallied to oppose the congressional reform bill.

RTI Taiwan Central Radio
